patthana12.5:1.1: Nahetuṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:2.1: Nahetuṃ nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.5:3.1: Nahetuṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:4.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:5.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:6.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:7.1: Nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:8.1: Nahetuṃ naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.5:9.1: Nahetuṃ nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:11.1: Nahetuṃ naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana12.5:12.1: Nahetuṃ naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.5:13.1: Nahetuṃ noupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṃ nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
